item.title: Multiple SSH keys setup for git
item.description: I always configure git to use SSH for connection. And I don’t share private keys among instances. I belive this is the best practice. As a contractor, I need to perform my work duties on my personal equipment from time to time. Organisations quite often hosts its repositories on github.com. GitHub in its official docs encourage users to use the same personal account for both private use and when working for an organisation.
